content: this frog desk buddy crochet pattern is the perfect amigurumi project for froggy lovers right hand frog desk buddy tutorial https //youtu be/r6senczomea left hand frog desk buddy tutorial https //youtu be/rufmwgmamic beginners to advanced crocheters can create this pattern with the following techniques -slipknot and chain -single_crochet -increasing 2 stitches into one stitch -decreasing join 2 stitches into 1 -small bobble -bobble -fastening off this advanced beginner pattern is written in u s crochet terms complete with clear instructions pictures and a video tutorial to help you along the way desk frog is crocheted in the round/continuous spirals without joining the rounds i suggest using a stitch marker or different color yarn to keep track of each round desk frog is crocheted in super bulky chenille yarn and is approximately 2 inches tall be aware that size may vary depending on the yarn and hook size used gauge is not particularly important just be consistent with the gauge you are using and most importantly have fun supplies needed -super bulky 6 weight yarn i used premier parfait chunky chenille yarn -h 5mm crochet hook -two 14mm plastic safety eyes not recommended for children under 3 years old -black embroidery floss and embroidery needle -yarn needle -scissors -locking stitch markers optional this crochet pattern as well as all images and text contained herein are copyrighted by yarnsociety com and should not be copied changed emailed re-sold reproduced or distributed in any way to any other person or persons you may however sell the final product or products created from this crochet pattern in accordance with your own state and local laws with the exception of mass production with intent for sale
